#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,i,n, a[101];
    long int c;
    cin>>t;              //no of test cases
    while(t>0)
    {
       scanf("%d",&n);            // total no of elephants
       scanf("%ld",&c);            // total number of candies
       for(i=0;i<n;i++)
       {
         scanf("%d",&a[i]);              
         c-=a[i];              
       }        
       if(c>=0)
       {
        cout<< "Yes"<<endl;
       }
       else
       {
       cout<<"No"<<endl;
       }       
              
    
    
    t-=1;          
    }
    
    fflush(stdin);
    getchar();
    return 0;
}
